# Test Cases

**Generated by requirements-gathering-agent v2.1.3**  
**Category:** quality-assurance  
**Generated:** 2025-06-19T09:58:21.042Z  
**Description:** Detailed test cases and test scenarios

---

## Test Cases Documentation for ADPA (Automated Documentation Project Assistant)

**1. Test Case Overview**

* **Purpose and Scope:** These test cases verify the functionality, usability, performance, security, and integration of the ADPA tool.  They cover all aspects of the application, from command-line interface usage to document generation and integration with various AI providers.

* **Test Case Naming Conventions:**  Each test case ID will follow the format `TC-[Area]-[Number]`, e.g., `TC-Func-001`.  `Area` can be Func (Functional), UI (User Interface), Int (Integration), Perf (Performance), Sec (Security), Neg (Negative), or Reg (Regression).

* **Test Case Categories and Priorities:** Test cases are categorized as described in the sections below. Priorities are assigned as follows:
    * Critical: Failure would render the system unusable or cause significant business disruption.
    * High: Failure would significantly impact functionality or user experience.
    * Medium: Failure would cause minor inconvenience or impact specific features.
    * Low: Failure would have minimal or no impact on overall functionality.

* **Traceability to Requirements:** Each test case will explicitly reference the relevant functional or non-functional requirement it tests (using Requirement ID from provided documents where applicable).


**2. Functional Test Cases**

| Test Case ID | Test Case Title                                   | Objective                                                                     | Preconditions                                           | Test Steps                                                                                                                                                           | Expected Results                                                                                                                                | Test Data                                                                 | Priority | Requirements Traceability |
|--------------|---------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|--------------------------|
| TC-Func-001  | Generate Core PMBOK Documents                     | Verify generation of core PMBOK documents.                                 | ADPA installed and configured.                               | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent --core-only`. <br> 2. Verify the existence of core documents (Project Summary, User Stories, etc.) in the output directory. | All specified core PMBOK documents are generated successfully and are structurally correct (correct file names, folders).                              | A simple `README.md` with basic project information.                         | High      | FR-1, FR-2                 |
| TC-Func-002  | Generate All PMBOK Documents                      | Verify generation of all PMBOK documents.                               | ADPA installed and configured.                               | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent`. <br> 2. Verify the existence of all PMBOK documents in the output directory.                                           | All specified PMBOK documents are generated successfully and are structurally correct (correct file names, folders).                               | Same as TC-Func-001                                                        | High      | FR-1, FR-2                 |
| TC-Func-003  | Generate Technical Design Documents               | Verify generation of technical design documents.                         | ADPA installed and configured.                               | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent --generate-technical`. <br> 2. Verify the existence of all technical design documents in the output directory.        | All specified technical documents are generated successfully and are structurally correct.                                                        | README.md with technical details.                                          | High      | FR-2, FR-7                  |
| TC-Func-004  | Generate Strategic Documents                     | Verify generation of strategic documents.                               | ADPA installed and configured.                               | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent --generate purpose-statement`. <br> 2. Verify generation of the purpose statement. Repeat for company values.       | Strategic documents are generated successfully and are structurally correct.                                                                   | README.md with high-level project goals and values.                          | Medium     | FR-2, FR-7                  |
| TC-Func-005  | PMBOK Validation                                  | Verify PMBOK validation functionality.                                  | ADPA installed and configured; PMBOK documents generated. | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent --validate-pmbok`. <br> 2. Check the validation report for compliance issues.                                         | Validation report is generated, indicating compliance or non-compliance with PMBOK standards.                                                  | Documents generated from TC-Func-002.                                        | High      | FR-6                       |
| TC-Func-006  | Support Multiple AI Providers                  | Verify support for multiple AI providers.                              | ADPA installed; API keys configured for at least two providers. | 1. Configure ADPA for OpenAI. <br> 2. Generate documents. <br> 3. Configure ADPA for Google AI. <br> 4. Generate documents. Repeat for other providers.      | Documents are successfully generated using each configured provider.                                                                        | README.md; API keys for different providers.                               | High      | FR-3                       |
| TC-Func-007  | Version Control System Functionality              | Verify Version Control System integration.                               | ADPA installed and configured.                               | 1. Generate documents. <br> 2. Modify README.md and regenerate. <br> 3. Use `requirements-gathering-agent vcs log`, `vcs diff`, etc. to verify version history. | Version history is correctly tracked and accessible through CLI commands.                                                                        | README.md (modified after first generation)                                | Medium     |  Requirement not explicitly stated, but implied in README|

| TC-UI-001    | Verify Help Message                  | Verify the help message displays correctly.                               | ADPA installed.                             | Run `requirements-gathering-agent -h` or `requirements-gathering-agent --help`.                                                                | Help message is displayed correctly, showing all available options and their descriptions.                                                            | None                                            | Low      | FR-5                       |
| TC-UI-002    | Verify Version Display               | Verify the version number is displayed correctly.                         | ADPA installed.                             | Run `requirements-gathering-agent -v` or `requirements-gathering-agent --version`.                                                              | Version number is displayed correctly.                                                                                                              | None                                            | Low      | FR-5                       |
| TC-UI-003    | Verify Invalid Command Handling       | Verify handling of invalid commands.                                      | ADPA installed.                             | Run `requirements-gathering-agent invalid-command`.                                                                                            | Appropriate error message is displayed, indicating the command is not recognized.                                                                  | "invalid-command"                                | Low      | FR-5                       |
| TC-UI-004    | Verify Output Directory Specification | Verify the ability to specify the output directory using the `--output` flag.| ADPA installed.                             | Run `requirements-gathering-agent --output ./my-output-dir`.                                                                                  | Documents are generated in the specified directory (`./my-output-dir`).                                                                             | None                                            | Medium     | FR-5                       |
| TC-UI-005    | Verify VCS Commands                  | Verify the functionality of VCS commands.                               | ADPA installed and configured; documents generated. | Generate documents, then use `requirements-gathering-agent vcs log`, `vcs diff`, `vcs status`, etc., to verify version control system functionality. | VCS commands execute successfully and provide correct output.                                                                                       | None                                            | Medium     |  Requirement not explicitly stated, but implied in README|

**5. Performance Test Cases**

| Test Case ID | Test Case Title           | Objective                                                                 | Preconditions                                                                      | Test Steps                                                                                                                                    | Expected Results                                                                                                                            | Test Data                                                                         | Priority | Requirements Traceability |
|--------------|---------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|--------------------------|
| TC-Perf-001  | Response Time Measurement | Measure the response time for generating core documents.                     | ADPA installed and configured.                                                      | 1. Run `requirements-gathering-agent --core-only` and measure the time taken.                                                                   | Response time is within acceptable limits (defined based on requirements).                                                                    | README.md of varying sizes                                                         | Medium     |  Requirement not explicitly stated, but implied in README |
| TC-Perf-002  | Load Testing              | Simulate concurrent users generating documents to assess system performance. | ADPA installed and configured.                                                      | Use a load testing tool to simulate multiple users concurrently generating documents.                                                          | System handles the load without significant performance degradation (defined based on requirements).                                            | Multiple concurrent requests for document generation                                | High      |  Requirement not explicitly stated, but implied in README |


**6. Security Test Cases**

| Test Case ID | Test Case Title                | Objective                                                                      | Preconditions                                                        | Test Steps                                                                                                                                                                        | Expected Results                                                                                                                                         | Test Data                                                              | Priority | Requirements Traceability |
|--------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|----------|--------------------------|
| TC-Sec-001   | Authentication Verification    | Verify that authentication mechanisms are working correctly for all providers.| ADPA installed; API keys/credentials configured for all supported providers. | Attempt to generate documents without authentication. Then, authenticate using valid credentials for each provider and verify document generation.                                                      | Authentication is required; valid credentials allow successful document generation.                                                                                      | Valid and invalid credentials for each provider.                 | High      | FR-3                       |
| TC-Sec-002   | Input Validation              | Verify that the system handles invalid input correctly.                        | ADPA installed.                                                           | Attempt to generate documents with invalid input (e.g., special characters in file paths, excessively large files).                                                                   | System handles invalid input gracefully, displaying appropriate error messages or rejecting the input without crashing.                                                              | Invalid input data (special characters, large files).                 | Medium     | FR-5                       |


**7. Negative Test Cases**

| Test Case ID | Test Case Title                     | Objective                                                                           | Preconditions                                           | Test Steps                                                                                                                                                           | Expected Results                                                                                                                                   | Test Data                                                                         | Priority | Requirements Traceability |
|--------------|--------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|--------------------------|
| TC-Neg-001   | Invalid README Input                 | Verify handling of invalid README.md files.                                      | ADPA installed.                                               | Run ADPA with a README.md containing invalid markdown or corrupted data.                                                                                             | System reports an error and gracefully handles the invalid input without crashing.                                                                            | Invalid README.md files (malformed markdown, corrupted data).                | Medium     | FR-1                       |
| TC-Neg-002   | Missing API Keys                  | Verify error handling when API keys are missing.                               | ADPA installed; API keys for all providers are removed.                  | Attempt to generate documents.                                                                                                                                      | System reports an error indicating missing API keys.                                                                                                    | No API keys                                                                        | High      | FR-3                       |
| TC-Neg-003   | Invalid API Keys                    | Verify error handling when API keys are invalid.                                | ADPA installed; API keys for all providers are replaced with invalid keys. | Attempt to generate documents.                                                                                                                                      | System reports an error indicating invalid API keys.                                                                                                    | Invalid API keys                                                                     | High      | FR-3                       |
| TC-Neg-004    | File System Errors                 | Verify handling of file system errors (e.g., insufficient disk space).           | ADPA installed; simulate low disk space.                               | Attempt to generate documents.                                                                                                                                      | System reports an error indicating file system issues.                                                                                                | Simulate low disk space                                                        | Medium     | FR-2                       |



**8. Regression Test Cases**

Regression testing will be performed after each code change or bug fix.  The test cases from sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7 will serve as regression test cases.  Focus will be on ensuring that previously working functionality remains unaffected by new changes.


**9. Test Data Requirements**

Test data will include various README.md files with different levels of complexity, completeness, and validity.  This will include simple README files, complex README files with extensive project information, and deliberately malformed README files to test error handling.  API keys for different AI providers will also be needed.

Data setup involves creating the necessary files and configuring the ADPA tool with the appropriate API keys and credentials.  Data cleanup involves removing the generated documents and any temporary files created during testing.


**10. Test Case Execution Guidelines**

* **Execution Order and Dependencies:**  Test cases can be executed independently, except where specified (e.g., regression tests depend on previous successful test runs).
* **Environment Prerequisites:**  A system with Node.js installed, and API keys for the selected AI providers.
* **Test Result Documentation:**  Test results will be documented in a spreadsheet or test management tool, including pass/fail status, actual results, and any relevant logs or screenshots.
* **Defect Reporting Procedures:**  Any defects found during testing will be reported using a bug tracking system, including detailed steps to reproduce, expected results, actual results, severity, and priority.



This document provides a comprehensive set of test cases.  The specific number of test cases and their complexity will need to be adjusted based on the final requirements and scope of the ADPA tool.  This is a starting point to be expanded upon during the testing phase.
